_metadata.description: MSV Software Catalog - Common Windows software with CPE mappings

software.notes: 67 CVEs in CISA KEV. Most used browser worldwide.
Chromium-based browser, shares vulnerabilities with Chrome.
Independent browser engine, separate vulnerability profile.
Chromium-based, privacy-focused browser.
Chromium-based browser.
1 CVE in KEV (CVE-2025-0411). MotW bypass vulnerability.
4 CVEs in KEV. Known ransomware exploitation.
Open-source archive manager.
76 Adobe CVEs in KEV. Use specific variant (Reader DC, Reader 2020, Reader 2024) for accurate MSV.
Full Acrobat suite. Used in enterprise PDF automation.
Alternative PDF reader.
SSH/Telnet client. CVE-2024-31497 ECDSA key compromise. Part of PuTTY suite.
Full PuTTY suite installer. Includes PuTTY, PSCP, PSFTP, Plink, Pageant, PuTTYgen.
Command-line SCP client. Portable executable. Part of PuTTY suite.
Command-line SFTP client. Portable executable. Part of PuTTY suite.
Command-line SSH connection tool. Used for automation/scripting. Part of PuTTY suite.
SSH authentication agent. Holds private keys in memory. Part of PuTTY suite.
SSH key generation utility. Converts between key formats. Part of PuTTY suite.
Telnet-only client (no SSH). Smaller binary. Part of PuTTY suite.
SFTP/SCP client. Common in enterprise file transfer.
Remote desktop tool. High-value target for attackers.
Remote desktop alternative to TeamViewer.
Popular text editor for developers and admins.
Popular IDE/editor. Extension ecosystem is attack surface.
Commercial text editor.
Network protocol analyzer. Used by security teams.
Network scanner. Common security tool.
Video conferencing. Frequently patched.
Team messaging platform.
Enterprise collaboration. Part of M365.
Voice/text chat. Growing enterprise adoption.
Open-source media player. Codec vulnerabilities.
Apple media manager for Windows.
Java Runtime Environment. Historical attack target.
Java Development Kit.
JavaScript runtime. Multiple LTS branches.
Python interpreter. LTS: 3.12.x, Current: 3.13.x
Version control. Includes Git Bash. Current: 2.47.x
FTP/SFTP client.
Cloud sync client.
Microsoft cloud sync. Built into Windows but updatable.
Google cloud sync client.
END OF LIFE (Dec 2020). 33 CVEs in KEV. Remove immediately if found.
END OF LIFE (Oct 2021). Remove immediately if found.
Citrix client. High-value enterprise target.
VM guest tools. Critical for virtualized environments.
VDI client.
Log forwarding agent.
Enterprise messaging middleware. 192+ CVEs tracked. Legacy name: WebSphere MQ.
EDR agent. Critical security component.
EDR agent.
Anti-malware tool.
Office suite. Multiple CVEs in KEV.
Open-source office suite.
System cleaner. Was compromised in supply chain attack.
Fast file search utility.
Bootable USB creation tool.
Screenshot tool.
Image viewer.
Password manager. Critical security tool.
Password manager.
Password manager.
Password manager. Had breaches.
Disk encryption. TrueCrypt successor.
7-Zip fork with additional compression.
Command-line HTTP client. Built into Windows 10+.
Crypto library. LTS: 3.0.x (EOL Sep 2026), Current: 3.4.x.
Open-source database.
Oracle MySQL database.
MySQL fork.
NoSQL database.
In-memory data store.
Web server/reverse proxy.
Web server. Multiple KEV entries.
Java web server. KEV entries.
Windows web server. Part of Windows Server.
Container platform. Current: 4.36.x.
Desktop virtualization.
VM management tool.
Infrastructure as Code.
Configuration management.
Use specific variant: 'windows powershell' for 5.1 (OS-built-in), 'powershell 6' (EOL), or 'powershell 7' for current standalone.
OS COMPONENT: Updated via Windows Update only. Cannot track independent MSV - keep Windows patched. CVE-2025-54100 (Invoke-WebRequest) patched in Dec 2025 cumulative update.
END OF LIFE (Sep 2020). First cross-platform PowerShell. Upgrade to PowerShell 7 immediately - no security patches available.
Standalone cross-platform PowerShell. LTS: 7.4.x (EOL Nov 2026), Current: 7.5.x (EOL May 2026). Separate from Windows PowerShell 5.1.
SSH server/client. Built into Windows.
Metrics collection agent.
Visualization platform. KEV entries.
Monitoring system.
Enterprise monitoring agent.
IT monitoring.
Streaming/recording software.
Video transcoder.
Image editor.
Audio editor.
3D modeling software.
Music streaming.
Gaming platform. Privilege escalation vulns.
GPU driver. Kernel-level access. Latest: 591.74 WHQL (Jan 2026).
GPU driver.
Intel GPU driver.
Audio driver.
Legacy communication. Being replaced by Teams.
Encrypted messaging.
Messaging platform.
Messaging platform.
SUNBURST supply chain attack (2020). Multiple KEV entries. Critical enterprise monitoring. Now called SolarWinds Platform.
Orion module. Network monitoring and alerting.
Orion module. Server and application monitoring.
Orion module. Network device configuration backup and management.
Orion module. Network traffic flow analysis.
Orion module. IP address management and DHCP/DNS integration.
Orion module. VMware/Hyper-V monitoring.
Database monitoring and query analysis.
Orion module. Syslog and log management.
Enterprise patch management. WSUS integration.
IT service management and ticketing. Multiple CVEs.
CRITICAL: Multiple CVEs in CISA KEV. Managed File Transfer server. High-value target.
CRITICAL: Multiple RCE vulns (CVE-2024-28991, CVE-2024-23469, etc.) patched in 2024.3. Access management and auditing.
Remote desktop tool. Part of Engineer's Toolset.
Full remote support suite. Includes remote control and system tools.
Collection of 60+ network diagnostic tools. Includes DameWare, traceroute, SNMP tools.
Lightweight syslog server. Common in small/medium environments.
Free SFTP/SCP server from SolarWinds.
Free TFTP server. Common for network device firmware updates.
Data visualization and analytics. Enterprise BI tool.
Enterprise analytics server. High-value target with sensitive data.
Data preparation and ETL tool.
Secure data connectivity between Tableau Cloud and on-premises data.
Continuous track (subscription). Auto-updates. 76 Adobe CVEs in KEV.
Classic track (perpetual license). Latest perpetual version. Quarterly updates.
Classic track (perpetual license). Extended support until 2025. Quarterly updates.
Free PDF reader. Continuous track (auto-updates). Most deployed PDF reader.
Free PDF reader. Classic track (perpetual). Extended support until 2025.
Free PDF reader. Classic track 2024 (perpetual license). Quarterly updates.
CRITICAL: Multiple CVEs in CISA KEV. Web application server. High-value target.
Enterprise CMS. Has KEV entries. Used for web content management.
CRITICAL: Multiple CVEs in CISA KEV. E-commerce platform. Handles payment data.
CRITICAL: 16 CVEs in CISA KEV. ProxyLogon, ProxyShell, ProxyNotShell. Enterprise email server.
CRITICAL: 11 CVEs in CISA KEV. Java application server. Deserialization RCE vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: 10 CVEs in CISA KEV. ERP platform. Business-critical systems.
CRITICAL: 9 CVEs in CISA KEV. Virtualization management. Full infrastructure access.
CRITICAL: 7 CVEs in CISA KEV. Java web framework. Equifax breach vector (CVE-2017-5638).
CRITICAL: 7 CVEs in CISA KEV. Enterprise collaboration. RCE and privilege escalation.
CRITICAL: 7+ CVEs in CISA KEV. VPN infrastructure. Primary APT target.
CRITICAL: 6 CVEs in CISA KEV. IT management suite. Multiple products affected.
CRITICAL: 5 CVEs in CISA KEV. Enterprise wiki. Data Center and Server editions.
CRITICAL: 4 CVEs in CISA KEV. Backup infrastructure. Ransomware deletes backups first.
CRITICAL: 4 CVEs in CISA KEV. Endpoint security. Privilege escalation to disable protection.
CRITICAL: 4 CVEs in CISA KEV. Device management. Mass deployment attack vector.
CRITICAL: 3 CVEs in CISA KEV. MFT server. Actively exploited for data exfiltration.
CRITICAL: 3 CVEs in CISA KEV. Hypervisor. Direct VM compromise and ransomware encryption.
CRITICAL: Enterprise virtualization management. VMSA advisories via Broadcom API.
Desktop hypervisor. VM escape vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: Issue tracking. Multiple high-severity CVEs. Data Center and Server editions.
CI/CD server. RCE vulnerabilities via build agents.
Git repository management. Data Center and Server editions.
CRITICAL: ADC appliance. Multiple critical CVEs actively exploited.
CRITICAL: VPN gateway. Authentication bypass and RCE vulnerabilities.
Hypervisor. VM escape vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: Java runtime. Quarterly CPU updates. Multiple CVEs per quarter.
CRITICAL: Java app server. Deserialization RCE vulnerabilities.
EDR/endpoint protection. Sensor and cloud connector.
Formerly McAfee. Enterprise endpoint protection.
Broadcom/Symantec enterprise endpoint protection.
CRITICAL: Enterprise VPN client. Authentication and RCE vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: Enterprise VPN client. Privilege escalation vulnerabilities.
VPN client and endpoint protection. SSL-VPN vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: Enterprise firewall OS. 18+ KEV CVEs. Remote code execution.
CRITICAL: Enterprise firewall OS. 6+ KEV CVEs. Authentication bypass.
CRITICAL: Enterprise firewall. 12+ KEV CVEs. Path traversal vulnerabilities.
Next-gen firewall. SSL VPN vulnerabilities. RCE exploits.
CRITICAL: Enterprise firewall OS. 6+ KEV CVEs. SSL VPN exploits.
CRITICAL: VPN appliance. Multiple KEV CVEs. RCE exploits.
IDE for Windows development. Occasional RCE via project files.
Java IDE. Plugin and project file vulnerabilities.
Video conferencing. Memory corruption and RCE vulnerabilities.
Backup and security. Agent vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: VPN gateway. Multiple actively exploited CVEs in CISA KEV.
CRITICAL: MDM solution. Authentication bypass CVEs in KEV.
CRITICAL: Managed file transfer. Mass exploitation in 2023 (Cl0p ransomware).
CRITICAL: Remote support tool. Command injection CVEs in KEV.
CRITICAL: Email gateway. Zero-day exploitation in 2023.
CRITICAL: Print management. RCE actively exploited by ransomware groups.
Enterprise backup. Pre-auth RCE vulnerabilities.
CRITICAL: Endpoint management. Multiple CVEs in CISA KEV.
CRITICAL: Network firewall. SQL injection and RCE CVEs.
CRITICAL: Load balancer/ADC. Multiple actively exploited CVEs.
